page.title: 01THE TOPSHAM AREA
page.content: This area includes the town of Topsham and the villages of Clyst St. George and Ebford, which lie to the south east of Exeter and are surrounded by farmland. Topsham is a small, quiet town which has the River Exe estuary running through it. It was once a thriving port but now the river is used mainly for pleasure craft and fishing. The area is served by a small railway, the Exeter to Exmouth branch line, which links in Exeter with main line services to London and Penzance. There is easy access to the M5 motorway which brings many tourists to this attractive area. There is a strong community spirit in Topsham and its many clubs and societies help to keep alive traditions and activities which give the place its character.
